about_the_game: The second expansion for Empire of Sin includes new game mechanics, missions, and powerful characters that come to visit Chicago. The question is, will you let them stay?

content_descriptors.notes: Contains moderate violence and mature themes.

detailed_description: The second expansion for Empire of Sin includes new game mechanics, missions, and powerful characters that come to visit Chicago. The question is, will you let them stay?
legal_notice: ©2020 Paradox Interactive. Empire of Sin and Paradox Interactive are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Paradox Interactive AB in Europe, the U.S., and other countries.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra (MAC OS X 10.13.6) Metal required.
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4690
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD® Radeon™ R9 M290X (2GB)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina (MAC OS X 10.15.7)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD® Radeon™ Pro 580 (8GB)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Empire of Sin - Expansion 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8.1 64 bit or Windows® 10 Home 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-530 or AMD® Phenom™ II X3 720
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 460 (1GB) or AMD® Radeon™ R7 250 (2GB), AMD® Radeon™ Vega 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD® Ryzen™ 5 3400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 770 (2GB) or AMD® Radeon™ RX 470 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: The second expansion for Empire of Sin includes new game mechanics, missions, and powerful characters that come to visit Chicago. The question is, will you let them stay?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
